user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and functionality in my undergarments, prioritizing practicality over aesthetics.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a functional item that prioritized comfort over aesthetics. The review highlighted the comfortable fit, which was a key factor in my decision, despite the lack of visual appeal.
I needed a reliable everyday bra that offered comfort. The review pointed out the softness and support, which were important to me, even though the design was not appealing.
Comfort was my main priority, and this product was praised for its fit and softness. The plain design was acceptable as long as it met my comfort needs.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, practical, and functional, with a focus on quality materials and fit. I appreciate items that are versatile for both casual and formal occasions, and I value features that enhance comfort, such as breathable fabrics and stretchability. However, I tend to dislike products that are poorly fitted, lack durability, or have unattractive designs. I also find it important that items maintain their quality over time, as I am not satisfied with products that show signs of wear too quickly.

conversation.content: I want to prioritize comfort and functionality in my undergarments over aesthetics. within my expected price range: [14.94, 20.99]
What specific features or functionalities are important to you when it comes to undergarments?

Comfort and functionality are crucial for me when it comes to undergarments. I value items that are made of breathable fabrics, have a comfortable fit, and offer good support. Stretchability is also important to ensure freedom of movement throughout the day. Durability is key as well, as I want my undergarments to maintain their quality over time.
What sizes do you usually wear in undergarments to ensure the perfect fit and comfort you are looking for?
I typically wear sizes that provide a perfect fit and ensure comfort in my undergarments. Size accuracy is crucial for me to achieve the level of comfort and support I desire throughout the day.

Its arch support, air mesh venting, and moisture management features will ensure lasting comfort.써코니 남성용 퍼포먼스 노쇼 양말은 편안함과 지지력의 완벽한 조합입니다. 가장 힘든 훈련 세션에 적합합니다. 아치 서포트, 에어 메시 통풍구, 습기 관리 기능으로 오래 지속되는 편안함을 보장합니다."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <adidas Alphaskin Maximum Cushioned Crew> / Item ID: B0C3RD1JYR / Price: $13.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Athletic Socks'] / Description: ['The alphaskin maximum cushioned crew is designed for best in class protection, comfort and performance for on the court and on the field. the 360-degree cushioned foot features extra targeted cushioning in the heel, toe & achilles for shock absorption (where you need it most). tonal, textured stripes on the back leg and footbed give a fresh, modern take on the classic adidas 3-stripes. articulated arch compression helps keep your sock in place. finished with an embroidered centerfront logo.']

I'm interested in finding undergarments that prioritize comfort and functionality over aesthetics within my expected price range. Can you provide me with more information about undergarment options that meet my needs?
What fabric types do you prefer in your undergarments to ensure both comfort and breathability throughout the day?

I prefer undergarments made of breathable fabrics like cotton or modal to ensure comfort and breathability throughout the day. Fabrics that offer stretchability are also important to me as they provide freedom of movement and ensure a comfortable fit. Durability is key for me as well, as I want my undergarments to maintain their quality over time.

Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Maidenform Women's Tame Your Tummy Shaping Lace Brief with Cool Comfort Dm0051> / Item ID: B0BTQ5MYJG / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for firm control shapewear with all-day comfort, you've found it with Maidenform®'s firm control briefs from the Tame Your Tummy collection. The brief silhouette, available with allover fabric or with a pretty stretch lace panty, is designed with a wide, toning waist panel for all-around smoothing that's effective yet comfortable. This firm control panty has a Smart Comfort® waistband that won't roll, dig or pinch, plus it's made with Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks moisture away from your skin to help you stay cool and dry. And it has a cotton-lined gusset for added comfort. You'll be delighted with the comfort of this firm control brief shaper that you can really wear all day long."]
